tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE books (
 book_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 book_title STRING NOT NULL,
 author_id UUID REFERENCES authors(author_id),
 genre STRING,
 publication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE books (
  book_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  book_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  author_id INT,
  genre VARCHAR(50),
  publication_date DATE
);
